diff_analysis.evidence: In server/events/vcs/gh_app_creds_rotator.go the OLD code logged only a generic success message ('Token successfully refreshed'), while the NEW code logs the actual GitHub App token value with `r.log.Debug("token %s", token)`. This change introduces information exposure through log files (CWE-532). The OLD code did not log sensitive token material and thus was not vulnerable in this way.
